name: OpinionPoll
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: opinion poll
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Reach out to your customers that already have Alexa App on their Android or Iphone and conduct polls using Alexa Voice App and the Opinion Poll Skill. There is no need to reach out the old school way of telephone or snail mail. Spend your Advertising dollars on promoting your poll.

Note: All user responses collected are anonymous. No personally identifiable information(PII) is collected.

Contact App developer at sales.doublelighttech@gmail.com to list your agency, poll question and choices. You will get results in any format you like.
